snippet: Limits on flights expired after more than three decades, and Southwest Airlines and Virgin America began new long-haul service.
abstract: Limits on flights from Dallas Love Field expire after more than three decades; Southwest Airlines and Virgin America begin new long-haul service from the airport.
lead_paragraph: Limits on flights expired after more than three decades, and Southwest Airlines and Virgin America began new long-haul service.

headline.main: Love Field in Dallas Offering More Flights From 2 Carriers
headline.print_headline: Love Field in Dallas Offering More Flights From 2 Carriers
